nodes.text: The Republic Mobile Surgical Units were mobile medical centers used by the Grand Army of the Republic to aid Galactic Republic forces on a battlefield. They were typically staffed by medical interns, droids, volunteers, and members of the Jedi MedCorps. For clone troopers with severe injuries, they were transported to Haven-class medical stations or mobile hospital ships such as Pelta-class frigates or MedStar-class frigates.
